item.title: Why Trump pick of ‘Dr. Oz’ to oversee Medicare, Medicaid could be ‘devastating’

Nvidia says Blackwell chip sales will exceed previous revenue estimate for Q4
I worked with Steve Jobs. Here’s what he’d say about today’s leadership style
item.description: Many of today's leaders seem to have embraced the more dangerous traits of Steve Jobs without balancing them with his better qualities.

item.title: Ukraine-Russia war escalates as Kremlin launches intercontinental ballistic missile for first time
item.description: While only two people were injured, the Russian attack signals the start of a new stage in the conflict as more advanced weapons are rolled out by bot...

item.title: Federal Reserve’s likely slowdown in rate cuts could make prospective homebuyers sad
item.description: Fewer rate cuts would likely mean continued high mortgage rates and other borrowing costs for consumers and businesses.

item.title: Donald Trump has a new line of branded gear: guitars that cost up to $10,000

item.title: Eli Manning, Derek Jeter, Jimmy Fallon join TGL New York Golf Club investor group
item.description: TGL is the new primetime, high-tech golf league launched by Tiger Woods, Rory McIlroy and Golf Channel executive Mike McCarley.

item.title: Nvidia absolutely crushes its Q3 earnings

item.title: Opinion: Why Nvidia investors are missing the forest for the trees
Nvidia shares slump 3% in premarket as quarterly revenue growth slows
item.description: Despite nearly doubling sales year-on-year, Nvidia's third-quarter results show a slowdown from previous quarters.

item.title: Baidu posts 3% drop in third-quarter revenues, beating market expectations
item.description: Beijing-based Baidu operates one of the major web browser search engines in China, along with a frequently used maps app.
